extends java.lang.Object
implements Z4JSONable

        public boolean isPositionOccupied​(double position,
                                  double tolerance)
        Checks if a position is occupied
        Parameters:
        position - The position (in the range [0,1])
        tolerance - The accepted tolerance around the position (a very small value, for example 0.01)
        Returns:
        true if the position is occupied, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        tolerance - The accepted tolerance around the position (a very small value, for example 0.01)
        Returns:
